transcript: as they seemed of them, one could feel by the occasional glances they gave that the story about Sergey Kuzmfch, the laughter, and the food were all a pretense, and that the whole attention of that company was directed to Pierre and Hlne. Prince Vasili mimicked the sobbing of Serge'y Kuzmfch and at the same time his eyes glanced toward his daughter, and while he laughed the expression on his face clearly said: "Yes . . . it's getting on, it will all be settled today." Anna Pdvlovna threa
